last_episode_to_air.name: The Newest Little Person
last_episode_to_air.overview: Baby Kinzley has finally arrived! Meanwhile, Dawn reveals one of Lila's deepest secrets to the others behind her back, and Jazmin makes one of the toughest decisions of her life.

name: Little Women: NY
overview: A group of little ladies navigate the Big Apple while facing obstacles that test people even of average height like hailing cabs, catching subways and traversing crowded streets. These east coast besties scramble to try to make it big in Manhattan, supporting one another every step of the way as they prove that “if they can make it there, they’ll make it anywhere”.

episodes.name: Big City, Little Women
episodes.overview: Meet the ladies (and man!) of Little Women: NY. Drama unfolds when special guest Elena visits Lila from Los Angeles and meets the rest of the crew out at drinks. When Elena brings up a taboo topic, Kristin reacts with a tearful panic attack and the rest of the group rallies around her.

episodes.name: Moving Out
episodes.overview: Jason asks Jordanna and Kristin to help him talk to his parents about a sensitive issue. How will Jason's conservative family take the news? Jordanna confronts Lila because she told Elena about Kristin's divorce. And later, Dawn lands herself on Misty and Kristin's bad side when she makes catty comments about their new apartment.

episodes.name: Burlesque Brawl
episodes.overview: Jordanna invites Jazmin and the other girls to perform in a burlesque show for her company, Sass N' Betties. Dawn makes her opinions about little people performing clear when she tells Jazmin she shouldn't dance in the show because it is degrading. Jazmin must choose between furthering her career and pleasing her judgmental sister-in-law.

episodes.name: Mardi Gras Melee
episodes.overview: Jordanna discovers the softer side of Dawn when she talks to her about her relationship with boyfriend Keith and the problems they've been having. Misty and Kristin invite the group to celebrate Mardi Gras and Lila is tempted to break her commitment to sobriety when she is surrounded by her partying friends.

episodes.name: The Intervention
episodes.overview: Christy McGinty from Little Women: LA enlists Dawn and Jazmin to stage an intervention for Lila and confront her about her recent drinking. Jordanna gets some bad news about her Broadway show and Kristin visits a fertility doctor to discuss her desire to have children.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: The Little Women: NY crew heads up to the beautiful Catskill Mountains on a ski trip that won't soon be forgotten! Surrounded by friends who are partying and drinking, Lila struggles with her sobriety. Later, an explosive argument between Jazmin and Dawn leaves one of them in tears.

episodes.name: The Little People Fashion Show
episodes.overview: Misty and Jordanna go to war with each other when they are both asked to walk in a little person fashion show at New York Fashion Week. Jason and Kristin are forced to take sides when Misty and Jordanna fight for an opportunity to walk in the Paris fashion show later this year.

episodes.name: The Vagina Monologues
episodes.overview: Dawn asks her friends to help her host an art auction that will raise money for a women's charity in New York. She asks the group to paint paintings of "lady parts" that Jason will then auction at the fancy event. At the party, Jason and Jordanna get into a huge blow out when he tries to auction her painting off for $5

episodes.name: Puerto Rico Fever
episodes.overview: Jazmin invites the rest of the group to go with her to Puerto Rico, but drama follows. Dawn confronts Kristin for making nasty comments about her charity auction. Jason and Jordanna's beef continues to grow and comes to a climax during a beautiful day out on the water. Man overboard!

episodes.name: The Big Question
episodes.overview: The tension between Misty and the rest of the group escalates. Kristin's mounting anxiety over her upcoming 38th birthday hits a fever pitch as the rest of the group tries to comfort her by throwing her an enormous, '20s themed birthday bash! Kristin's boyfriend Josh unexpectedly shows up at the last minute...but wait...is that a ring in his pocket?

episodes.name: New Roommates, New Drama
episodes.overview: While Jason surprises everyone with his new love interest, one of the girls has news of her own--she's pregnant!  Jazmin's husband makes an announcement that starts a family feud, and a surprise guest sends Lila over the edge.

episodes.name: Agree to Disagree
episodes.overview: A night of belly dancing gets heated when Jazmin confronts Dawn about being a disappointing sister-in-law. Meanwhile, one of the girl's receives shocking news about her baby.

episodes.name: Into the Wild
episodes.overview: As the rift between Dawn and Jazmin widens, Jason tries to plan a peaceful weekend away for the group that quickly blows up in his face. A secret is revealed that rocks the group and puts someone in danger.

episodes.name: A Rough Patch
episodes.overview: The group finally meets Katie's boyfriend PJ but when they share their concerns about the health of Katie and her baby, drama erupts during a visit to a pumpkin patch.

episodes.name: Jason Gets His Groove Back
episodes.overview: When Dawn and David dig up the past, things get explosive. Meanwhile, Jason has a confession to make to DJ, and an unwelcome guest crashes Katie's baby shower.

episodes.name: It's Go Time
episodes.overview: The pressure is on when DJ asks Jason to move in with him. Meanwhile Dawn learns more about Lila's scandalous love life. When Lila and Dawn confront Katie about PJ, they could never have imagined what would happen next.

episodes.name: The Newest Little Person
episodes.overview: Baby Kinzley has finally arrived! Meanwhile, Dawn reveals one of Lila's deepest secrets to the others behind her back, and Jazmin makes one of the toughest decisions of her life.
